about_the_game:
Description:



Welcome to an immersive experience in the game HORNY TEACHERS WANT TO FUCK.
You step into the shoes of a new college student embarking on a journey through campus life. HOT SEX await, with various characters,
including the college nurse, the physical education teacher, the principal, the English teacher, and the librarian.

Key Features:



Interactions and SEX: Have realistic sex in virtual reality. During sex, you have control over the animation speed and changing the sexual position. You will experience a deeper interaction thanks to the interaction points with which you can move the girl's arms and legs and, if you feel like it, you can grab the cock in your hand, jerk it off and cum on the girl.

Campus Exploration: During the game, you will find yourself in places such as the nurse's room, library, lecture hall or even the college principal's room.

Virtual Reality: With VR, you can fully immerse yourself in the world of college life and remember your own desires.

Your teacher is in the game!!!???
Will you fuck her???
